definition: to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: We should remember all those who have gone before us.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该记住所有那些先驱者。

sentences.english: This forerunner of the musket is capable of firing deadly volleys that can pierce armour.
sentences.chinese: 这些火枪的先驱者可以射出穿透盔甲的致命齐射。

sentences.english: The vast majority of pioneers in the hip hop industry have been African-American and Latino.
sentences.chinese: 嘻哈业内的大部分先驱者都是非裔美国人和拉丁人。

sentences.english: Mind flayers enslaved entire races, including the githyanki forerunners.
sentences.chinese: 夺心魔奴役着整个种族，包括吉斯洋基人的先驱者们。

sentences.english: At present, Pioneer 10 is traveling about one light-hour farther away from the sun every 3 years.
sentences.chinese: 目前，先驱者正以大概每三年一光时的速度远离太阳。

sentences.english: They see themselves as pioneers, exploring the emerging superpower up close.
sentences.chinese: 他们视自己为先驱者，探索这个冉冉升起的超级大国。

sentences.english: And to some certain extent, Park is also a pioneer in media technology doctrine.
sentences.chinese: 在某种程度上，帕克也是媒介技术主义的先驱者。

sentences.english: Shen Yizhen was the pioneer of talent education in modern China.
sentences.chinese: 沈亦珍是我国现代超常教育的先驱者。

sentences.english: He was the forerunner of the resistance.
sentences.chinese: 他是这个反抗运动的先驱者。

sentences.english: Chogyam Trungpa Rinpoche was a pioneer and igniter of Buddhadharma in the West.
sentences.chinese: 邱阳创巴仁波切是将佛法传至西方的先驱者和燃火者。

sentences.english: Jia Sixie is known as one of the pioneers of farming.
sentences.chinese: 贾思勰被认为是农学的先驱者之一。

sentences.english: Recognize that dual responsibility and lead.
sentences.chinese: 认识到这一双重责任，勇为先驱者。

sentences.english: A pioneer in blood Lichen, Beacon Road, Blue jacket, a look back at history, inspire new thinking.
sentences.chinese: 先驱者一片血忱，毕路蓝褛，回望历史，启迪新思。

sentences.english: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche was a pioneer and igniter of Buddhadharma in the West.
sentences.chinese: 邱阳创巴仁波切是将佛法传至西方的先驱者和燃火者。

sentences.english: Sometimes the real trailblazers never get in the history books.
sentences.chinese: 有的时候，那些真正的先驱者一直都没有被记入史册。

sentences.english: Yet there are significant difficulties and risks in being a first mover.
sentences.chinese: 然而做为先驱者，也存在着很大的困难和风险。

definition: the earliest ancestor/originator (of a tradition, school of thought etc)
